creator: jack@lavnet.net
text:
When compiling 

Server version: Apache/2.0.49 on  Redhat 9

Linux collective.vs.lmco.com 2.4.20-30.9smp #1 SMP Wed Feb 4 20:36:46 EST 2004
i686 i686 i386 GNU/Li
nux

with 

./configure --enable-layout=RedHat --enable-mods-shared=all -enable-ssl

and the following rpm installs

openssl-devel-0.9.7a-20.2
openssl-0.9.7a-20.2

I had to add this "-I/usr/kerberos/include" to the EXTRA_INCLUDES in 
build/config_vars.mk

not sure how to fix the configure script.

thanks in advance
Jack Lavender
